entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
